question.text: Choose the correct statement regarding the catalytic converters.

options.text: Motor vehicles equipped with catalytic converter should use leaded petrol
Catalytic converters have expensive metals namely platinum-palladium and rhodium as catalyst
Catalytic converters help in reducing particulate matter
As the exhaust passes through the catalytic converter nitrogen gas is converted to nitric oxide

solution.text: Converting toxic pollutants of the vehicular exhaust gas into less toxic form by catalyzed redox reaction is the function of catalytic converters. Expensive metals like rhodium (reduction catalyst), palladium (oxidation catalyst) and platinum (oxidation/reduction catalyst) are used for the catalytic process. These convert the hydrocarbons to carbon dioxide and water. Also, carbon monoxide and nitric oxide are changed to nitrogen gas and carbon dioxide.
